name: Superman
biography: Superman is a superhero from DC Comics. He is known for his superhuman strength, ability to fly, and X-ray vision.

name: Batman
biography: Batman is a superhero from DC Comics. He is known for his martial arts skills, brilliant intellect, and vast wealth.

name: Wonder Woman
biography: Wonder Woman is a superheroine from DC Comics. She is an Amazon warrior princess with superhuman abilities and wielder of the Lasso of Truth.

name: Spider-Man
biography: Spider-Man is a superhero from Marvel Comics. After being bitten by a radioactive spider, he gained spider-like abilities.

name: Iron Man
biography: Iron Man is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He is known for his advanced armor suit and technological genius.

name: Thor
biography: Thor is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He is the god of thunder and wields a magical hammer called Mjolnir.

name: Captain America
biography: Captain America is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He is a symbol of patriotism and wields an indestructible shield.

name: Hulk
biography: Hulk is a superhero from Marvel Comics. When he gets angry, he transforms into a giant green-skinned creature with incredible strength.

name: Aquaman
biography: Aquaman is the king of Atlantis and has the ability to communicate with sea creatures and control water.

name: Black Widow
biography: Black Widow is a spy and S.H.I.E.L.D. agent with exceptional combat skills and espionage experience.

name: Green Lantern
biography: Green Lantern is a member of the Green Lantern Corps, an intergalactic group of universe guardians. He uses a power ring that grants him abilities.

name: Doctor Strange
biography: Doctor Strange is the Sorcerer Supreme of the Marvel universe. He uses magic and sorcery to defend the world from supernatural threats.

name: Wolverine
biography: Wolverine is a mutant with a skeleton coated in adamantium and retractable claws. He is a fierce fighter and has incredible regeneration ability.

name: Captain Marvel
biography: Captain Marvel is a superheroine with cosmic powers. She is an Air Force pilot turned space hero.

name: Black Panther
biography: Black Panther is the king of Wakanda and possesses enhanced abilities from the heart-shaped herb. He also has access to vibranium.

name: Flash
biography: The Flash is a superhero from DC Comics. He possesses the ability of super speed and is a founding member of the Justice League.

name: Cyborg
biography: Cyborg is a superhero who is part human and part machine. He has superhuman strength and various technological abilities.

name: Ant-Man
biography: Ant-Man is a superhero capable of shrinking and communicating with ants. He uses a special suit and helmet to control his ability.

name: Daredevil
biography: Daredevil is a blind lawyer who fights crime in Hell's Kitchen, New York. He has enhanced senses and is an expert in martial arts.

name: Catwoman
biography: Catwoman is a complex anti-heroine from DC Comics. She is known for her agility, thievery skills, and complicated relationship with Batman.

name: Mr. Miracle
biography: Mr. Miracle is a superhero from DC Comics known as the greatest escape artist in the universe. He was raised on Apokolips and escaped to Earth.

name: Plastic Man
biography: Plastic Man is a superhero from DC Comics with the ability to stretch and contort his body into any shape. He was a former criminal who turned to heroism.

name: Shazam
biography: Shazam, also known as Captain Marvel, is a superhero from DC Comics. A young boy who transforms into an adult superhero by uttering the magic word 'Shazam'.
equipment: Magic powers granted by the wizard Shazam

name: Space Ghost
biography: Space Ghost is a superhero and intergalactic crime-fighter created by Hanna-Barbera. He uses his powerful armbands and ship, the Phantom Cruiser, to fight evil.

name: Beast
biography: Beast is a superhero and member of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. He is known for his superhuman strength, agility, and intelligence, as well as his blue fur.

name: Angel
biography: Angel is a superhero and member of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. He has large, feathered wings that allow him to fly and is known for his wealth and compassion.

name: Captain Britain
biography: Captain Britain is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He was granted powers by the magician Merlyn and protects Britain with his strength, flight, and mystical abilities.

name: Cyclops
biography: Cyclops is a superhero and leader of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. He emits powerful optic blasts from his eyes and is known for his leadership and tactical skills.

name: Falcon
biography: Falcon is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He is known for his ability to fly using a specialized wing harness and his partnership with Captain America.

name: Human Torch
biography: Human Torch is a superhero and member of the Fantastic Four from Marvel Comics. He can engulf his body in flames and fly, as well as control fire.

name: Iceman
biography: Iceman is a superhero and member of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. He can generate and manipulate ice, turning his body into ice and creating ice constructs.

name: Invisible Woman
biography: Invisible Woman is a superhero and member of the Fantastic Four from Marvel Comics. She can become invisible and generate force fields.

name: Mar-Vell
biography: Mar-Vell, also known as Captain Marvel, is a superhero from Marvel Comics. He is a Kree warrior who protects Earth with his advanced alien abilities.

name: Mr. Fantastic
biography: Mr. Fantastic is a superhero and leader of the Fantastic Four from Marvel Comics. He has the ability to stretch his body into any shape and is a brilliant scientist.

name: Punisher
biography: Punisher is an anti-hero from Marvel Comics. A former Marine who wages a one-man war on crime using his military training and arsenal of weapons.

name: Rogue
biography: Rogue is a superhero and member of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. She can absorb the powers, memories, and abilities of others through physical touch.

name: Thing
biography: Thing is a superhero and member of the Fantastic Four from Marvel Comics. He possesses superhuman strength and durability, and his body is covered in rock-like skin.

name: Black Bolt
biography: Black Bolt is a superhero and leader of the Inhumans from Marvel Comics. He has a powerful voice that can cause massive destruction with a whisper.

name: Bullseye
biography: Bullseye is a supervillain and archenemy of Daredevil from Marvel Comics. He is known for his exceptional accuracy and ability to turn any object into a deadly weapon.
equipment: Various weapons improvised from everyday objects

name: Ghost Rider
biography: Ghost Rider is a superhero from Marvel Comics. Johnny Blaze made a deal with the devil to save his father's life and was transformed into the Spirit of Vengeance.

name: Phoenix
biography: Phoenix is a superhero and member of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. She is a powerful telepath and telekinetic who becomes the host for the cosmic Phoenix Force.

name: Professor X
biography: Professor X is a superhero and founder of the X-Men from Marvel Comics. He is a powerful telepath and advocates for peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants.

name: Space Ghost
biography: Space Ghost is a superhero and intergalactic crime-fighter created by Hanna-Barbera. He uses his powerful armbands and ship, the Phantom Cruiser, to fight evil.

name: War Machine
biography: War Machine is a superhero and ally of Iron Man from Marvel Comics. He wears a heavily armed suit of armor that grants him superhuman strength and advanced weaponry.
